1/* mpc_out_str -- Output a complex number on a given stream.
2

21#include <stdio.h> /* for FILE */
22#include <ctype.h>
23#include "mpc-impl.h"
24
25size_t
26mpc_out_str (FILE *stream, int base, size_t n, mpc_srcptr op, mpc_rnd_t rnd) {
27 size_t size = 3; /* for '(', ' ' and ')' */
28
29 if (stream == NULL)
30 stream = stdout; /* fprintf does not allow NULL as first argument */
31
32 fprintf (stream, "(");
33 size += mpfr_out_str (stream, base, n, mpc_realref(op), MPC_RND_RE(rnd));
34 fprintf (stream, " ");
35 size += mpfr_out_str (stream, base, n, mpc_imagref(op), MPC_RND_RE(rnd));
36 fprintf (stream, ")");
37
38 return size;
39}
40
